name: Bike Events
author: FreeHub

sections.description:
Include a comprehensive listing of upcoming bicycle rides, races and events on your sidebar with links to more information.
Pick a U.S. ZIP code, and the widget finds nearby events within a search radius.
Pick the number of events to display.

Currently, this only works for the United States with U.S. ZIP codes. We are working on a version that will include Canada, England and Australia. If you know of a good source for cycling events in those countries, please post a comment at http://www.freehub.net/bike-events-widget

Support

For issues or feature requests, please visit http://www.freehub.net/bike-events-widget
sections.changelog:
Features are generally added in one-dot releases, while two-dot releases contain fixes and small updates.

2.0

  • Includes a new feature to allow searching for events based on the user’s location (by geocoding the users IP address) in addition to the zip code provided.

1.4

  • Corrected a bug that prevented events from being displayed in certain situations.

1.3

  • Included a default zip code of ‘10001’, which is NY City.
  • Utilized the $_SERVER[‘SERVER_NAME’] as the blog name, which should be more reliable.

1.2

  • Corrected problem when installing plugin.

1.1

  • Removed the FreeHub promotional link once the events have been loaded. If for any reasons the events do not load, users will see a link to the FreeHub page with the events that should have loaded.
  • Corrected the spinner image which wasn’t always spinning during the AJAX load process.
  • Included the blog name in the information passed back to the server.
  • Removed the “get this widget” link.

1.0

  • Initial releases

short_description: This widgets returns a comprehensive list of local bicycle rides and races in your area based on the users location or a US ZIP code and search radius …
